name: Aven Wind Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

name: Brute Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

name: Carrion Screecher
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The banished have come home to roost.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
oracle_text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Decision Paralysis
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"Eyes see only what is possible. A trained mind can explore the impossible."
—Kefnet, god of knowledge

name: Destructive Tampering
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."
—Karavin, renegade saboteur

name: Dramatic Reversal
oracle_text: Untap all nonland permanents you control.
flavor_text:
"Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Fiend Binder
oracle_text: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

name: Gavony Unhallowed
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.
flavor_text:
"We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Grazing Whiptail
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.

name: Kargan Dragonrider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

name: Lightning Strike
oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

name: Salvager of Secrets
oracle_text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

name: Sparktongue Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

name: Spidery Grasp
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle."
—Yonda of Gavony

name: Take Vengeance
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

name: Tattered Mummy
oracle_text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city crave only to spread their curse.

name: Topan Freeblade
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor_text: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

name: Voldaren Duelist
oracle_text:
Haste
When Voldaren Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "I have yet to find my equal."

name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
oracle_text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.
